JavaScript

Next
  • Currently well support standard is ECMAScript7
  • Latest version of standard is ECMAScript14 (released in June 2023)
  • Features introduced in ECMASCRIPT6
    • class declarations
    • import/export
    • for ... of loops
    • Python-style generator
    • let and const
    • ... and many more.
  • For more info: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript
